price: 71. Il n’est aucun d’entre vous qui ne s’en approchera.[312] C’est là un arrêt irréversible de ton Seigneur.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
footnotes: [312] Il n’est aucun d’entre vous qui ne traversera le pont (As-Sirât) qui enjambe l’Enfer.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
